Interface IEnquiryService

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnquiryService
public interface IEnquiryService

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
    Adds a new enquiry to the service's internal list.
    Enquiry

    Finds an enquiry by its unique ID.

    Retrieves a list containing all enquiries currently managed by the service.

  • Method Details

    • loadEnquiries

      List<Enquiry> loadEnquiries()
      Loads enquiry data from persistent storage (e.g., CSV file). Populates the service's internal enquiry list.
      Returns:
      A list of loaded Enquiry objects.

    • saveEnquiries

      void saveEnquiries(List<Enquiry> enquiries)
      Saves the provided list of enquiries to persistent storage. Overwrites the existing enquiry data file.
      Parameters:
      enquiries - The list of Enquiry objects to be saved.

    • addEnquiry

      void addEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Adds a new enquiry to the service's internal list. Should perform checks to prevent adding duplicates (based on enquiry ID).
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The Enquiry object to add.

    • removeEnquiry

      boolean removeEnquiry(String enquiryId)
      Removes an enquiry from the service's internal list based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry was found and removed, false otherwise.

    • findEnquiryById

      Enquiry findEnquiryById(String enquiryId)
      Finds an enquiry by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to find.
      Returns:
      The Enquiry object if found, or null otherwise.

    • getEnquiriesByApplicant

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant(String applicantNric)
      Retrieves a list of all enquiries submitted by a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant.
      Returns:
      A list of Enquiry objects submitted by the specified applicant. Returns an empty list if NRIC is null or no enquiries are found.

    • getEnquiriesByProject

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByProject(String projectName)
      Retrieves a list of all enquiries associated with a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project.
      Returns:
      A list of Enquiry objects for the specified project. Returns an empty list if projectName is null or no enquiries are found.

    • getAllEnquiries

      List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Retrieves a list containing all enquiries currently managed by the service. Implementations should consider returning a copy.
      Returns:
      A list of all Enquiry objects.
